[data-ref=fillTicks].title: Toggle stretching
[data-ref=fillTicks].content: Click to toggle the fillTicks setting on/off

.b-gantt-task-wrap[data-task-id='11'].title: Stretched task
.b-gantt-task-wrap[data-task-id='11'].content: This task starts at 8 AM and ends at 5 PM, but is stretched to fill the whole day
